snippet: Six leaders of South Korea’s biggest Buddhist order have quit after a video filmed secretly showed some monks playing high-stakes poker, drinking and smoking.
lead_paragraph: Six leaders of South Korea’s biggest Buddhist order have quit after a video filmed secretly showed some monks playing high-stakes poker, drinking and smoking.

headline.main: South Korea: Monks Resign Over Poker Scandal
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Monks Resign Over Poker Scandal
